scripts.stop:services: pm2 stop all && pm2 delete all
scripts.build: npm run build:api-gateway && npm run build:auth && npm run build:chat && npm run build:notification && npm run build:user
scripts.build:api-gateway: cd api-gateway && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:auth: cd auth-microservice && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:chat: cd chat-microservice && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:notification: cd notification-microservice && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:user: cd user-microservice && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm run install:api-gateway && npm run install:auth && npm run install:chat && npm run install:notification && npm run install:user
